title: Bread machine hot cross buns
ingredients: ['2 eggs', '150g butter, cut into pieces', '600ml milk', '1 teaspoon salt', '3 tablespoons caster sugar', '360g plain flour', '2 teaspoons active dried yeast', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 tablespoon raisins', 'Topping', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon milk', '3 tablespoons icing sugar', '1 tablespoon lemon juice, or as needed']
